name: Orb of Deception
description: Ahri fires an orb in a line dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through. It then returns to her, dealing true damage to all enemies it passes through.

name: Galaxy Shield-Blast
description: Annie blasts a cone of fire dealing magic damage to enemies in front of her, then shields herself for 4 seconds.

name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
description: Ashe fires and arrow toward the farthest enemy that explodes on the first target hit, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and stunning them for 2 seconds.

name: Mobilize the Fleet
description: Aurelion Sol launches fighters, which fly out to random enemies, deal magic damage, and then return. Aurelion Sol launches all ready fighters plus 3 additional when he casts. Fighters prefer to target nearby enemies.

name: Rocket Grab
description: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 2.5 seconds. The next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second. Allies within range will prioritize attacking Blitzcrank's target.

name: Ace in the Hole
description: Caitlyn takes aim at the furthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

name: Rupture
description: Cho'Gath ruptures a large area, dealing magic damage and knocking up all enemies within.

name: Dreadnova Guillotine
description: Darius dunks an enemy, dealing magic damage. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again. Targets below 50% health take double damage.

name: Dreadnova Guillotine
description: Darius dunks an enemy, dealing magic damage. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again. Targets below 50% health take double damage.

name: E.M.P.
description: Ezreal fires an electromagnetic pulse at a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and increases the cost of their next spell cast by 40%.

name: Riposte
description: Fiora enters a defensive stance for 1.5 seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. As she exits this stance, she ripostes, dealing magic damage to a nearby enemy and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Chum the Waters
description: Fizz throws a lure that attracts a shark, causing it to emerge after a brief delay. It deals magic damage to enemies caught, knocking them back and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Orbital Strike
description: Gangplank calls down a large orbital strike around his target, dealing magic damage to all enemies in that area for 2 seconds.

name: Smoke Grenade
description: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward the highest attack speed enemy, which explodes on impact dealing magic damage to enemies in the area and causing their attacks to miss for 4 seconds.

name: Bladesurge
description: Irelia dashes past her target, attacking them for a percentage of her Attack Damage as she passes through. If this kills the target, she casts again immediately at the enemy with the highest mana.

name: Ageless Standard
description: Jarvan calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting nearby allies Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

name: To the Skies
description: Jayce jumps into the air and slams his hammer, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

name: Whisper
description: Jhin converts each 1% of bonus attack speed he has into 0.8 attack damage. Every fourth shot, Jhin deals a bonus percent of attack damage.

name: Get Excited
description: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemies. After her first takedown, Jinx gains bonus attack speed. After her second takedown, Jinx swaps to her rocket launcher, causing her Basic Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area around her target.

name: Missile Rain
description: Kai'Sa launches missiles towards each nearby enemy that deal 50 magic damage each.

name: Inspire
description: At the start of combat, Karma tethers to her closest ally. Karma shields the tethered ally, or random if the ally is dead for 4 seconds. While the shield holds, the ally receives bonus attack speed.

name: Force Pulse
description: Kassadin releases a wave of energy in front of him, dealing magic damage and disarming all targets hit.

name: Ascent
description: Kayle Ascends, causing her attacks to launch waves that deal bonus magic damage until the end of combat.

name: Taste their Fear
description: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage. If the target has no adjacent teammates, this damage is increased.

name: Cyber Barrier
description: Leona creates a barrier, reducing all incoming damage for 4 seconds.

name: Relentless Pursuit
description: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then Basic Attacks them and fires a second shot which deals magic damage.

name: Mass Polymorph
description: Lulu polymorphs the nearest enemies for 4 seconds, rendering them unable to attack or cast, and causing them to hop around aimlessly. Polymorphed enemies take additional damage(5% / 10% / 25%).

name: Lurid Binding
description: Lux fires a sphere of darkness towards the farthest enemy. Enemies caught along its path take magic damage and are stunned.

name: Energy Shield
description: Malphite starts combat with a shield equal to a percent of his maximum health.

name: Chosen One
description: For 5 seconds, Master Yi gains massively increased movement speed, heals for a percentage of his maximum health each second, and deals bonus true damage with his Basic Attacks.

name: Bullet Time
description: Miss Fortune channels and fires waves of bullets in a cone for 2.25 seconds, dealing a percentage of enemies' maximum health in magic damage over the duration.

name: Indestructible
description: Mordekaiser gains a shield that absorbs damage. While the shield persists, Mordekaiser deals magic damage per second to all nearby enemies.

name: Pop Blossom
description: Neeko leaps into the air and slams into the ground, dealing magic damage and stunning all nearby enemies.

name: Buckler Toss
description: Poppy throws her buckler at the furthest enemy dealing damage. The buckler bounces back to Poppy, shielding her.

name: Grand Entrance
description: Rakan dashes to his attack target and leaps into the air, knocking up and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Flamespitter
description: Rumble torches his enemies, dealing magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds, and reducing healing on them by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Deceive
description: Shaco teleports and backstabs his target, critically striking for a percentage of his Basic Attack damage.

name: Future's Refuge
description: Shen creates a zone around himself for a few seconds, granting all narby allies 100% chance to dodge incoming basic attacks. While active, Shen gains Magic Resist(20 / 40 / 60).

name: Aria of Perseverance
description: Sona heals injured allies and cleanses them of all negative effects(Number of Targets: 2 / 3 / 5).

name: Wish
description: Soraka heals all allies.

name: Unleashed Power
description: Syndra pulls in all orbs on the battlefield and creates 3 new ones, then fires them all at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage per orb.

name: Temporal Passage
description: Thresh tosses his lantern towards random unit(s) on your bench, pulling them into the current combat and granting them and himself bonus mana. Traits are unaffected.

name: Wild Cards
description: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal magic damage to each enemy they pass through.

name: Lifeform Disintegration Ray
description: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that sweeps across the battlefield over 2.5 seconds, dealing magic damage per second to enemies hit.

name: Assault and Battery
description: Vi charges at the furthest enemy, knocking aside and dealing magic damage to all enemies along the way. When she reaches her target, she deals magic damage and knocks them up.

name: Cyclone
description: Wukong spins rapidly around, dealing magic damage to nearby units over 3 seconds. The first time Wukong hits each enemy, he knocks them into the air and stuns them for(2 / 2.5 / 5) seconds.

name: Deadly Plumage
description: Xayah creates a storm of blades, gaining Attack Speed for 8 seconds.

name: Three Talon Strike
description: Xin Zhao quickly strikes his target three times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects. The third strike deals bonus magic damage and knocks his target up for 1.5 seconds.

name: Last Breath
description: Yasuo blinks to the enemy with the most items and knocks them up, holding them airborne for 1 second and hitting them multiple times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

name: Bomb
description: Ziggs throws a bomb at an enemy, dealing magic damage.

name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
description: Zoe kicks a bubble at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage and stunning them for( 2 / 2.5 / 5) seconds.

name: Abyssal Bombardment
description: Xerath transforms, summoning meteors to strike random foes in place of his normal attacks. Meteors deal magic damage upon impact and if they kill their target, all adjacent enemies take magic damage and are stunned for 1.5 seconds.
